body: You become a larger, awful version of yourself. You grow to size Large, and take on features that horrify your enemies. You gain the following abilities: a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 natural armor bonus, DR 10/magic, and spell resistance equal to 10 + half your caster level. You also emit an aura that emanates 30 feet from you. Enemy creatures within the aura are shaken. Each time a creature shaken by this aura hits you with a melee attack, that creature becomes frightened for 1d4 rounds, though at the end of that duration it is no longer affected by this aura. The aura's effect is a fear and mind-affecting effect.
description: You take on a terrifying, Large-sized form of yourself and emit an aura that causes creatures to become shaken or frightened.
level_text: Cleric: 8; Oracle: 8; Warpriest: 8; Druid: 8; Sorcerer: 8; Wizard: 8; Arcanist: 8; Witch: 8
component_text: V, S, M (the skin of a toad)
name: Frightful Aspect
